content: 2024 spring snowflake doily far field crafts spring snowflake mini doily pattern special stitches 3 double_crochet cluster yo draw up loop from next st yo and pull through 2 loops yo draw up loop from same stitch yo and pull through 2 loops twice more yo and pull through all 4 loops on hook 2 treble_crochet cluster yo twice insert hook in next stitch draw up loop yo pull through two loops twice yo twice insert hook in same stitch draw up loop yo pull through two loops twice yo pull through all three loops on hook 3 chain picot chain 3 and slip_stitch to front loop of beginning single_crochet special treble_crochet cluster yo 2 times insert hook in next single_crochet on right side draw up loop pull through 2 loops twice yo 2 times skip 4 single_crochet and insert hook into 3rd single_crochet on left side draw up loop pull through two loops twice yo and pull through 3 loops pattern by far field crafts 2024 do not reproduce 2024 spring snowflake doily far field crafts starting round chain 5 join with slip_stitch to first chain round 1 ch3 counts as first double_crochet double_crochet 15 in starting round loop round 2 ch2 2 double_crochet cluster in same st chain 3 skip 1 st *3 double_crochet cluster ch3 sk1 repeat from * around slip_stitch to top of 2dc starting cluster 8 double_crochet clusters 8 chain space round 3 slip_stitch in next chain space ch3 starting double_crochet dc3 in same space *ch3 4dc in next space repeat from * around ch3 slip_stitch to top of starting double_crochet 8 groups of 4 double_crochet round 4 slip_stitch in next double_crochet chain 1 *single_crochet in between same double_crochet and next double_crochet ch4 single_crochet in next chain space ch4 repeat from * around omitting last chain 4 ch2 half_double_crochet in starting single_crochet round 5 ch1 single_crochet in same chain space *ch5 single_crochet in next chain space repeat from * around chain 5 slip_stitch in starting single_crochet round 6 slip_stitch in next chain space ch3 starting double_crochet 8 double_crochet in same space *single_crochet in next chain space 9 double_crochet in next space repeat from * around single_crochet in last chain space slip_stitch to top of ch3 starting double_crochet pattern by far field crafts 2024 do not reproduce 2024 spring snowflake doily far field crafts round 7 slip_stitch in next 4 double_crochet from round 6 chain 3 1 treble_crochet chain 1 2 treble_crochet cluster ch1 2 times *ch3 single_crochet in next single_crochet from round 6 chain 4 skip 4 double_crochet 2 treble_crochet cluster chain 1 3 times in 5th double_crochet from round 6 repeat from * 7 times chain 3 single_crochet in next single_crochet ch4 slip_stitch to starting treble_crochet cluster round 8 ch1 *single_crochet in next chain 1 space ch6 single_crochet in next space ch3 sc5 in chain 4 space from prev round sc5 in next space ch3 repeat from * around slip_stitch to starting single_crochet round 9 *4 single_crochet in space 3 chain picot see pattern
